verses.roman:
śloka paḍi' prabhu sukhe premāviṣṭa hailā
hena-kāle rūpa-gosāñi snāna kari' āilā

synonyms: śloka paḍi'-reading this verse; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sukhe—in great happiness; prema-āviṣṭa hailā—became overwhelmed by ecstatic love; hena-kāle—at that time; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; snāna kari'-after taking his bath; āilā—came back.
translation: After reading the verse, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was overwhelmed by ecstatic love. At that very time, Rūpa Gosvāmī returned, having finished bathing in the sea.
